attributes.action: Make sure that NHS staff never need to pay for parking at their place of work.
attributes.additional_details: Bring into law that NHS can not be charged to park at their place of work
attributes.background: NHS are showing now more than ever just how valuable they are and how they constantly put their lives at risk to save others. It's disgraceful that NHS staff have to pay to park at there place of work and this needs to stop immediately.
